name: A on Steroids
description:
Fly your A (spacecraft), avoid lasers, collect steroids, shot aliens and asteroids to achieve the highest score in this inspired by classic Asteroids arcade game.

Unique features included:

  • realistic destruction model --->
  • local multiplayer (1-4 players)

Other features:

  • Gamepad support

Keyboard controls:

  • Left/Right arrow - turn
  • Up arrow - thrust
  • Space - shot
  • Left Alt - shield discharge
  • Escape - Pause/Leave
  • F11 - switch Fullscreen (not available on Linux)

This game is in active development (Early Access) so please expect frequent updates.

Download & Installation:

Use itch.io client for the best download & installation experience :-)

Linux notes:

Extract all the files from the .zip file and use AonSteroids executable to launch the game.
